body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Spencer County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Burge. Father of Margaret A. Burge, John J. C. Burge, James S. Burge, George L. Burge, Matilda B. Burge, Affire E. Burge, Newton J. Burge, and Jackson L. Burge. Married to Lucy Robertson Burge on April 16, 1857. Father of Susan E. Burge, Rebecca Burge, Dudley S. Burge, and Delley Burge. Farmer in Anderson County in 1850 and 1860.
